refnamediv.refpurpose: Drops SQL wrapper types of selected Java classes

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
This function calls the jvm_ref_import()
function to produce the XML, then transforms it to a set of DROP TYPE statements and executes them.

refsect2.title: files
refsect2.para: Null, string or vector of strings. This can contain one or many Java .class files, .zip or .jar files to pick classes from. Null means only the classes specified in the classes argument regardless of their physical location.

refsect2.title: classes
refsect2.para: Wildcard string or a vector of strings specifying which classes to describe in the resulting XML.

example.title: Simple Use
